summary.para: Determines whether the package is optional.

param.name: isOptionalPackage
param.para: True if the package is optional, false otherwise.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the main package name from the optional package.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides access to attribute values of the optional package information.
